rdf:Description.dc:description: Biographical and personality information page about justin including pictures.
rdf:Description.dc:title: justin in life
rdf:Description.dc:creator: justin tung

CONTENT.h2: Put your personality to the test!
CONTENT.p:
Just a little fun , here is the result of a personality test (it only takes 5 seconds) I took on the internet around 1999 and another time in 2003. I apparently lean on the "blue/purplish" shades in the pictures.
Take it for yourself and see!
Birthdate: October 18, 1980 in Scarborough, Ontario , Canada.
That means... I am a Libra by the Western horoscope, a Monkey by the Chinese Zodiac, and a Canadian d(^_^)b .
